name: Jax Jones
description: '''Timucin Lam''' (born '''Timucin Fabian Kwong Wah Aluo'''; 25 July 1987), known professionally as '''Jax Jones''', is an English DJ, record producer and remixer. He rose to prominence in 2014 by featuring on [[Duke Dumont]]'s number-one single "[[I Got U]]". He followed this with his own singles, "[[You Don't Know Me (Jax Jones song)|You Don't Know Me]]" featuring [[Raye]] in 2016, and "[[Instruction (song)|Instruction]]" featuring [[Demi Lovato]] and [[Stefflon Don]] in 2017. Jax's debut studio album, ''[[Snacks (Supersize)]]'' was released in 2019.
